data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article van Achterberg, Cornelis, Carron, Nilo F. Ortiz de Zugasti (2016): Revision of the genus Paralipsis Foerster, 1863 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae), with the description of two new species. ZooKeys 606: 25-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.606.9656, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.606.9656
